alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, or near Pembroke Pines, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Miami Gardens, Weston, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Royal Palm Ranches, Palm Springs North, Sunshine Acres, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, Country Club, Pennsuco, Miramar Parkway And University Drive and Intersection Krome And U.S. 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
